messages.content: What new nodes have been added in version 1.1.0 of comfyui-bus-plugin?
The new nodes added in version 1.1.0 of comfyui-bus-plugin are: CLIP Conditioning Bus.
What purpose does the CLIP Conditioning Bus serve?
The CLIP Conditioning Bus allows for the conditioning of images and videos with a specific prompt.
What new nodes were added in the release 1.0.0 of comfyui-bus-plugin?

The new nodes added in the release 1.0.0 of comfyui-bus-plugin include: Checkpoint Bus, CLIP Encoded Prompt Bus, Image Bus, Image Parameter Bus, Image Size Bus, Latent Image Bus, Latent Image Parameters Bus, Prompt Bus, and Prompt SDXL Bus.
What are the nodes in the Checkpoint Bus used for in comfyui-bus-plugin?
The nodes in the Checkpoint Bus are used to load a model, CLIP, and VAE (Variational Autoencoders) from a previously saved checkpoint.
Will the removing of the 'license' property in the 'pyproject.toml' file of comfyui-bus-plugin influence its usage?
Yes, removing the 'license' property in the 'pyproject.toml' file can affect the license and usage conditions of comfyui-bus-plugin.
What is the purpose of comfyui-bus-plugin?
comfyui-bus-plugin is a collection of nodes for rerouting multiple I/O lines together in a bus in ComfyUI.
Why are there different nodes for different combinations of data in comfyui-bus-plugin?
Because ComfyUI does not support generic I/O connections, there have to be different nodes for the different combinations of data being passed around.
Which node in comfyui-bus-plugin is used for passing around model, CLIP, and VAE from a loaded checkpoint?
The Checkpoint Bus node in comfyui-bus-plugin is used for passing around model, CLIP, and VAE from a loaded checkpoint.
Which node in comfyui-bus-plugin is used for passing around positive and negative prompt text strings?
The Prompt Bus node in comfyui-bus-plugin is used for passing around positive and negative prompt text strings.
Can some of the bus nodes in comfyui-bus-plugin have their inputs converted to widgets?

Yes, some of the bus nodes in comfyui-bus-plugin, such as the Image Parameter Bus node, can have their inputs converted to widgets and be used as the input node to the bus or other workflows instead of creating primitive nodes for each parameter.
What is the license for comfyui-bus-plugin?
comfyui-bus-plugin is licensed under the GPL-3 license.
Who is the copyright holder of comfyui-bus-plugin?
The copyright holder of comfyui-bus-plugin is Reece H. Dunn.
